original_name: Midnight Mass with Your Hostess Peaches Christ
plot: Hostess Peaches Christ is back again to celebrate her big ten-year anniversary with five weeks of midnight movie insanity sure to satisfy the appetites of cult film fans everywhere.
plot_en: Hostess Peaches Christ is back again to celebrate her big ten-year anniversary with five weeks of midnight movie insanity sure to satisfy the appetites of cult film fans everywhere.
plot_es: Hostess Peaches Christ is back again to celebrate her big ten-year anniversary with five weeks of midnight movie insanity sure to satisfy the appetites of cult film fans everywhere.
title: Midnight Mass with Your Hostess Peaches Christ
